aka: Tyler Perry's Madea Gets a Job
trans_title: Tyler Perry's Madea Gets a Job
introduction: Tyler Perry's Madea Gets a Job movie was released Feb 05, 2013 by the Lionsgate studio. Tyler Perry's new musical stage play stars the infamous Mabel "Madea" Simmons. Tyler Perry's Madea Gets a Job video When a judge orders Madea to do 20 hours of community service at a local retirement home, the residents and staff are not ready for Madea's brand of "the truth", but all is well that ends well when Madea helps the residents of Easy Rest Retirement Home realize the importance of family, love and forgiveness.In this stage musical, Tyler Perry sends his most famous character Madea to work at a retirement home after she is ordered to perform community service. While there, she helps the residence mend numerous familial fractures.
